content:
## Autocomplete

=== "Windows"

    | Action                      | Shortcut                 |
    |-----------------------------|--------------------------|
    | Start completion            | ++control+space++        |
    | Accept completion           | ++enter++ **or** ++tab++ |
    | Close completion            | ++escape++               |
    | Navigate completion options | ++up++ **or** ++down++   |

=== "macOS"

    | Action                      | Shortcut                 |
    |-----------------------------|--------------------------|
    | Start completion            | ++control+space++        |
    | Accept completion           | ++enter++ **or** ++tab++ |
    | Close completion            | ++escape++               |
    | Navigate completion options | ++up++ **or** ++down++   |

=== "Linux"

    | Action                      | Shortcut                 |
    |-----------------------------|--------------------------|
    | Start completion            | ++control+space++        |
    | Accept completion           | ++enter++ **or** ++tab++ |
    | Close completion            | ++escape++               |
    | Navigate completion options | ++up++ **or** ++down++   |
